    Always Learning: User Experience Design

    less than 1 minute read

    I’ve recently developed an interest in learning more about user experience (UX) design. I decided to start by taking an online, non-credit introductory course (link to certificate).  I think I’ll read a book about the topic next. I welcome any book and online resource recommendations!
